parameters.name: DBClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBClusters](~~612241~~) operation to query the cluster IDs of all AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) clusters within a region.

parameters.name: DBVersion
parameters.description:
The minor version to which you want to update.

>  You can call the **DescribeKernelVersion** operation to query the supported minor versions.

parameters.name: SwitchMode
parameters.description:
The time when to perform the update. Valid values:

*   **0** (default): immediately performs the update.
*   **1**: performs the update during the maintenance window.

>  You can call the [ModifyDBClusterMaintainTime](~~612236~~) operation to modify the maintenance window of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.
